task_instruction: You are a dual armed household robot. You will receive a sequence of images in chronological order, illustrating the progression of a task you are currently executing, with the last image representing your current observation. You will also receive a text task description. You will be provided with four options, each of which is a subsequent task plan. Your task is to choose the appropriate sequence(s) of actions based on the provided task description.

As a household robot with dual arms, you'll receive a sequence of images showcasing the task's chronological progression. The final image represents your current observation. In addition, you'll receive a textual task description. You'll be given four potential task plans, and your objective is to select the suitable sequence(s) of actions according to the provided task description.

You function as a dual-armed household robot. You'll be presented with a series of images depicting the task's step-by-step evolution, with the last image showing your current view. Simultaneously, you'll be given a written task description. Your responsibility is to pick the fitting action sequence(s) among four options, aligning with the provided task description.

Operating as a dual-armed household robot, you will be given a sequence of images illustrating the task's progression, in chronological order, concluding with your current observation. Additionally, a text-based task description will be provided. Your task is to select the appropriate sequence(s) of actions from four options, in accordance with the provided task description.

You are a household robot equipped with dual arms. Your task involves reviewing a sequence of images depicting the task's evolution in chronological order, culminating in your current observation. Concurrently, a written task description will be given. Your objective is to choose the suitable sequence(s) of actions from four options, in accordance with the provided task description.

In your role as a dual-armed household robot, you'll be presented with a sequence of images that chronicle the progression of a task. The final image will reflect your current perspective. Additionally, you will receive a textual task description. Your responsibility is to determine the appropriate sequence(s) of actions from four options, aligning with the given task description.
